recipe.title: Salmon and Cucumber Boats
ingredients: 6 ounces smoked salmon, cut into 1/2-inch squares
8 kirby (or Persian) cucumbers, peeled, halved lengthwise and seeded
instructions: Zest orange over a bowl. Cut away rind. Section orange over bowl, removing membranes and catching juices and sections in bowl. Mix in salmon, tomato, onions, basil, oil, pepper and salt. Divide salmon mixture evenly among cucumber boats. Top each boat with 1 1/2 teaspoons sour cream. Serve with bread.
